EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Phone Call Follow Up (1335286798.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Dan, You are more than welcome, it was my pleasure! I really meant the things I said about the website. I think it is informative and professional without being too “showy” or overdone. I also really like the logo – especially after you explained the meaning. That was really neat. Thanks, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Dan Belanger [mailto:dan@beltechgroupinc.com] Sent: Friday, April 20, 2012 12:32 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Phone Call Follow Up Hi Sara, Good conversation – thanks. A good deal of my success is due to listening to others. Do you truly believe our website looks good? No sugar coating please. Best, Dan Belanger From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2012 3:07 PM To: dan@beltechgroupinc.com <mailto:dan@beltechgroupinc.com> Subject: MBO Partners Phone Call Follow Up Dear Dan , It was a pleasure speaking with you today, I enjoyed learning about your backgroud and Belltech’s history. In case you are curious, you’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here. Looking forward to connecting on linked in. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCf1BXlUVz5%2BicIaHqjTrVapGmuPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
